7c81d133-c3a9-42d0-8015-049f2833422e: Every rank of this power grants you a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g}.
9e1e3cf0-63dd-4190-b761-00291e11dca6:
This feature grants you the following benefits depending on its rank:
1st — a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}lawful{/g} enemies
2nd — a +2 bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and a +5 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
3rd — Moderate Fortification effect; a +2 bonus on attack rolls and a +5 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
4th — Moderate Fortification effect; a +2 bonus on attack rolls and a +10 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
5th — Moderate Fortification effect; a +4 bonus on attack rolls and a +10 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
6th — Improved Moderate Fortification effect (60%); a +4 bonus on attack rolls and a +10 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
7th — Improved Moderate Fortification effect (60%); a +4 bonus on attack rolls and a +15 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
8th — Improved Moderate Fortification effect (60%); a +6 bonus on attack rolls and a +15 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
9th — Heavy Fortification effect; a +6 bonus on attack rolls and a +15 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
10th — Heavy Fortification effect; a +6 bonus on attack rolls and a +20 bonus on damage rolls against lawful enemies
179a6303-0d1e-4adc-aaee-41f9aa83a54c:
This power grants you the following benefits depending on its rank:
1st — a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against Anomaly Distortion effect
2nd — a +2 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect and a +2 bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}chaotic{/g} enemies
3rd — {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}Spell resistance{/g} 25, a +2 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect, and a +2 bonus to AC against chaotic enemies
4th — Spell resistance 25, a +4 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect, and a +2 bonus to AC against chaotic enemies
5th — Spell resistance 25, a +4 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect, and a +4 bonus to AC against chaotic enemies
6th — Spell resistance 35, a +4 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect, and a +4 bonus to AC against chaotic enemies
7th — Spell resistance 35, a +6 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect, and a +4 bonus to AC against chaotic enemies
8th — Spell resistance 35, a +6 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect, and a +6 bonus to AC against chaotic enemies
9th — Spell resistance 40, a +6 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect, and a +6 bonus to AC against chaotic enemies
10th — Spell resistance 40, a +8 bonus on saving throws against Anomaly Distortion effect, and a +6 bonus to AC against chaotic enemies
5300ef70-fd1f-4299-a0b6-1f04232425ff: Those who are filled with primordial fear lose their immunity to mind-affecting {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and conditions.
ddbf515f-e255-44e9-92c6-75c66537333f: Those who suffer from the wrath of the Colorless Lord lose all their {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} as well as {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} immunity (including Magic Nullification) and also have to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} twice on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} taking the worst result.
c420fe5e-1eb9-401c-ac71-2cd33afc5b42: Whenever the owner of these memories receives a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, they gain immunity against critical hits for the next 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
1103a3db-7be7-4c71-a26a-43b815e4336c: You gain a +2 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against the Anomaly Distortion effect. There is also a 33% chance that Distortion will not occur.
104822ac-618e-408d-a154-1620a9248cf9: You have learned to see the world as proteans see it. You can detect anomalies and find the keystones that hold Valmallos's world together.
